h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: However, you'll also need to be ready to deal with its one major attack, which usually comes after you've assaulted its sphere at least once.

However, you'll also need to be ready to deal with its one major attack, which usually comes after you've assaulted its sphere at least once.
